verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> ho-Du O give thanks לַ֭יהוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD קִרְא֣וּ <WH7121> kir-'U call בִּשְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> bish-Mo; upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <WH3045> ho-Di-'u make known בָ֝עַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> va-'am-Mim, among the people עֲלִילוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5949> a-li-lo-Tav. his deeds

שִֽׁירוּ־ <WH7891> shi-ru- Sing ל֭וֹ lo זַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> zam-me-ru- unto him sing psalms ל֑וֹ lo; שִׂ֝֗יחוּ <WH7878> ·chu unto him talk בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol of all נִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tav. ye of all his wondrous works

הִֽ֭תְהַלְלוּ <WH1984> Hit-hal-lu Glory בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> be-Shem name קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho; ye in his holy יִ֝שְׂמַ֗ח <WH8055> yis-Mach, of them rejoice לֵ֤ב׀ <WH3820> lev let the heart מְבַקְשֵׁ֬י <WH1245> me-vak-Shei that seek יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

דִּרְשׁ֣וּ <WH1875> dir-Shu Seek יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD וְעֻזּ֑וֹ <WH5797> ve-'uz-Zo; and his strength בַּקְּשׁ֖וּ <WH1245> bak-ke-Shu seek פָנָ֣יו <WH6440> fa-Nav his face תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> ta-Mid. evermore

זִכְר֗וּ <WH2142> zich-Ru, Remember נִפְלְאוֹתָ֥יו <WH6381> nif-le-'o-Tav his marvellous works אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah; that he hath done מֹ֝פְתָ֗יו <WH4159> mo-fe-Tav, his wonders וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <WH4941> u-mish-pe-tei- and the judgments פִֽיו׃ <WH6310> Fiv. of his mouth

זֶ֭רַע <WH2233> Ze-ra' O ye seed אַבְרָהָ֣ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham of Abraham עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> av-Do; his servant בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei ye children יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בְּחִירָֽיו׃ <WH972> be-chi-Rav. his chosen

ה֭וּא <WH1931> hu He יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh He [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, [are] in all the earth מִשְׁפָּטָֽיו׃ <WH4941> mish-pa-Tav. his judgments

זָכַ֣ר <WH2142> za-Char He hath remembered לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> be-ri-To; his covenant דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> da-Var the word צִ֝וָּ֗ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah, [which] he commanded לְאֶ֣לֶף <WH505> le-'E-lef to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> Dor. generations

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כָּ֭רַת <WH3772> Ka-rat Which [covenant] he made אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham; with Abraham וּשְׁב֖וּעָת֣וֹ <WH7621> u-she-Vu-'a-To and his oath לְיִשְׂחָֽק׃ <WH3446> le-yis-Chak. unto Isaac

וַיַּֽעֲמִידֶ֣הָ <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-mi-De-ha And confirmed לְיַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko the same unto Jacob לְחֹ֑ק <WH2706> le-Chok; for a law לְ֝יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El, [and] to Israel בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. [for] an everlasting

לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, Saying לְךָ֗ le-Cha, אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten Unto thee will I give אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> 'e-retz- the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan חֶ֝֗בֶל <WH2256> Che-vel, the lot נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃ <WH5159> na-cha-lat-Chem. of your inheritance

בִּֽ֭הְיוֹתָם <WH1961> Bih-yo-tom were only מְתֵ֣י <WH4962> me-Tei When they were [but] a few men מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> mis-Par; in number כִּ֝מְעַ֗ט <WH4592> kim-'At, yea very few וְגָרִ֥ים <WH1481> ve-ga-Rim and strangers בָּֽהּ׃ Bah.

וַֽ֭יִּתְהַלְּכוּ <WH1980> Vai-yit-hal-le-chu When they went מִגּ֣וֹי <WH1471> mig-Goy from one nation אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גּ֑וֹי <WH1471> Goy; nation מִ֝מַּמְלָכָ֗ה <WH4467> mi-mam-la-Chah, to another from [one] kingdom אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about עַ֥ם <WH5971> 'am people אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> 'a-Cher. to another

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no הִנִּ֣יחַ <WH3240> hin-Ni-ach He suffered אָדָ֣ם <WH120> 'a-Dam no man לְעָשְׁקָ֑ם <WH6231> le-'a-she-Kam; to do them wrong וַיּ֖וֹכַח <WH3198> vai-Yo-chach yea he reproved עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem their sakes מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> me-la-Chim. kings

אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- no תִּגְּע֥וּ <WH5060> tig-ge-'U [Saying] Touch בִמְשִׁיחָ֑י <WH4899> vim-shi-Chai; not mine anointed וְ֝לִנְבִיאַי <WH5030> Ve-lin-vi-'ai and do my prophets אַל־ <WH408> 'al- no תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7489> ta-Re-'u. no harm

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra Moreover he called רָ֭עָב <WH7458> ra-'o for a famine עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; upon the land כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- the whole מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> mat-teh- the whole staff לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem of bread שָׁבָֽר׃ <WH7665> sha-Var. he brake

שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sha-Lach He sent לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <WH6440> lif-nei-Hem before אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; a man לְ֝עֶ֗בֶד <WH5650> le-'E-ved, for a servant נִמְכַּ֥ר <WH4376> nim-Kar [who] was sold יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> yo-Sef. them [even] Joseph

עִנּ֣וּ <WH6031> 'in-Nu they hurt בַכֶּ֣בֶל <WH3525> vak-Ke-vel with fetters; רַגְלָיו rag-lav כרַגְלֹ֑ו <WH7272> rag-Lo; be able to endure קבַּ֝רְזֶ֗ל <WH1270> bar-Zel, in iron בָּ֣אָה <WH935> Ba-'ah was laid נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> naf-Sho. he

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- Until עֵ֥ת <WH6256> 'et Until the time בֹּֽא־ <WH935> bo- came דְבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> de-va-Ro; that his word אִמְרַ֖ת <WH565> 'im-Rat the word יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD צְרָפָֽתְהוּ׃ <WH6884> tze-ra-Fa-te-hu. tried

שָׁ֣לַח <WH7971> Sha-lach sent מֶ֭לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech The king וַיַּתִּירֵ֑הוּ <WH5425> va-yat-ti-Re-hu; and loosed מֹשֵׁ֥ל <WH4910> mo-Shel him [even] the ruler עַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim, of the people וַֽיְפַתְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH6605> Vay-fat-te-Che-hu. and let him go free

שָׂמ֣וֹ <WH7760> sa-Mo He made אָד֣וֹן <WH113> a-Don him lord לְבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> le-vei-To; of his house וּ֝מֹשֵׁ֗ל <WH4910> u-mo-Shel, and ruler בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all קִנְיָנֽוֹ׃ <WH7075> kin-ya-No. of all his substance

לֶאְסֹ֣ר <WH631> le'-Sor To bind שָׂרָ֣יו <WH8269> sa-Rav his princes בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> be-naf-Sho; at his pleasure וּזְקֵנָ֥יו <WH2205> u-ze-ke-Nav and teach his senators יְחַכֵּֽם׃ <WH2449> ye-chak-Kem. wisdom

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo also came יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; into Egypt וְ֝יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ve-ya-'a-Ko, and Jacob גָּ֣ר <WH1481> gar sojourned בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> be-'e-retz- in the land חָֽם׃ <WH2526> Cham. of Ham

וַיֶּ֣פֶר <WH6509> vai-Ye-fer And he increased אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמּ֣וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo his people מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; greatly וַ֝יַּֽעֲצִמֵהוּ <WH6105> Vai-ya-'a-tzi-me-hu and made them stronger מִצָּרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> mitz-tza-Rav. than their enemies

הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> ha-Fach He turned לִ֭בָּם <WH3820> Lib-bom their heart לִשְׂנֹ֣א <WH8130> lis-No to hate עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; his people לְ֝הִתְנַכֵּ֗ל <WH5230> le-hit-nak-Kel, to deal subtilly בַּעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> ba-'a-va-Dav. with his servants

שָׁ֭לַח <WH7971> lach He sent מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses עַבְדּ֑וֹ <WH5650> av-Do; his servant אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, [and] Aaron אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom בָּֽחַר־ <WH977> ba-char- whom he had chosen בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

שָֽׂמוּ־ <WH7760> sa-mu- They shewed בָ֭ם vam דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei acts אֹתוֹתָ֑יו <WH226> o-to-Tav; his wondrous וּ֝מֹפְתִ֗ים <WH4159> u-mo-fe-Tim, among them and wonders בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land חָֽם׃ <WH2526> Cham. of Ham

שָׁ֣לַֽח <WH7971> Sha-lach He sent חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech darkness וַיַּחְשִׁ֑ךְ <WH2821> vai-yach-Shich; and made it dark וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- did not מָ֝ר֗וּ <WH4784> ma-Ru, and they rebelled אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- against; דְּבָרָוו de-va-ra-vv כדְּבָרֹֽו׃ <WH1697> de-va-Ro. act ק

הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> ha-Fach He turned אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֵימֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4325> mei-mei-Hem their waters לְדָ֑ם <WH1818> le-Dam; into blood וַ֝יָּ֗מֶת <WH4191> vai-Ya-met, and slew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּגָתָֽם׃ <WH1710> de-ga-Tam. their fish

שָׁרַ֣ץ <WH8317> sha-Ratz in abundance אַרְצָ֣ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam Their land צְפַרְדְּעִ֑ים <WH6854> tze-far-de-'Im; frogs בְּ֝חַדְרֵ֗י <WH2315> be-chad-Rei, in the chambers מַלְכֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4428> mal-chei-Hem. of their kings

אָ֭מַר <WH559> 'A-mar He spake וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and there came עָרֹ֑ב <WH6157> a-Ro; divers sorts of flies כִּ֝נִּ֗ים <WH3654> kin-Nim, [and] lice בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam. in all their coasts

נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan He gave גִּשְׁמֵיהֶ֣ם <WH1653> gish-mei-Hem for rain בָּרָ֑ד <WH1259> ba-Rad; them hail אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> 'esh fire לֶהָב֣וֹת <WH3852> le-ha-Vot [and] flaming בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> be-'ar-Tzam. in their land

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach He smote גַּ֭פְנָם <WH1612> Gaf-nom their vines וּתְאֵנָתָ֑ם <WH8384> u-te-'e-na-Tam; also and their fig trees וַ֝יְשַׁבֵּ֗ר <WH7665> vay-shab-Ber, and brake עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz the trees גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lam. of their coasts

אָ֭מַר <WH559> 'A-mar He spake וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came אַרְבֶּ֑ה <WH697> 'ar-Beh; and the locusts וְ֝יֶ֗לֶק <WH3218> ve-Ye-lek, and caterpillers וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein without מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> mis-Par. and that without number

וַיֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> vai-Yo-chal And did eat up כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> 'E-sev all the herbs בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> be-'ar-Tzam; in their land וַ֝יֹּ֗אכַל <WH398> vai-Yo-chal, and devoured פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> pe-Ri the fruit אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <WH127> 'ad-ma-Tam. of their ground

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach He smote כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor also all the firstborn בְּאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> be-'ar-Tzam; in their land רֵ֝אשִׁ֗ית <WH7225> re-Shit, the chief לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol of all אוֹנָֽם׃ <WH202> o-Nam. of all their strength

וַֽ֭יּוֹצִיאֵם <WH3318> Vai-yo-tzi-'em He brought them forth בְּכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> be-Che-sef also with silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> ve-za-Hav; and gold וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> ve-'Ein there בִּשְׁבָטָ֣יו <WH7626> bish-va-Tav [person] among their tribes כּוֹשֵֽׁל׃ <WH3782> ko-Shel. and [there was] not one feeble

שָׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> sa-Mach was glad מִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim Egypt בְּצֵאתָ֑ם <WH3318> be-tze-Tam; when they departed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- of them נָפַ֖ל <WH5307> na-Fal of them fell פַּחְדָּ֣ם <WH6343> pach-Dam for the fear עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem. and

פָּרַ֣שׂ <WH6566> pa-Ras He spread עָנָ֣ן <WH6051> 'a-Nan a cloud לְמָסָ֑ךְ <WH4539> le-ma-Sach; for a covering וְ֝אֵ֗שׁ <WH784> ve-'Esh, and fire לְהָאִ֥יר <WH215> le-ha-'Ir to give light לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> La-ye-lah. in the night

שָׁאַ֣ל <WH7592> sha-'Al [The people] asked וַיָּבֵ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve and he brought שְׂלָ֑ו <WH7958> se-Lav; quails וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> ve-Le-chem them with the bread שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> Ma-yim, of heaven יַשְׂבִּיעֵֽם׃ <WH7646> yas-bi-'Em. and satisfied

פָּ֣תַח <WH6605> Pa-tach He opened צ֭וּר <WH6697> tzur the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <WH2100> vai-ya-Zu-vu gushed out מָ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; and the waters הָ֝לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> ha-le-Chu, they ran בַּצִּיּ֥וֹת <WH6723> batz-tzi-Yot in the dry places נָהָֽר׃ <WH5104> na-Har. [like] a river

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for זָ֭כַר <WH2142> Za-char For he remembered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> de-Var promise קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho; his holy אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham [and] Abraham עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH5650> av-Do. his servant

בַּעֲב֤וּר׀ <WH5668> ba-'a-Vur So יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> yish-me-Ru That they might observe חֻ֭קָּיו <WH2706> Chuk-kav his statutes וְתוֹרֹתָ֥יו <WH8451> ve-to-ro-Tav his laws יִנְצֹ֗רוּ <WH5341> yin-Tzo-ru, and keep הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
